titles: An extract of a letter from York, dated the 31. of Decemb. 1659. concerning the Lord Fairfax's raising that county in arms against illegal taxes and free-quarter, and for the freedom of Parliament, as it was in the year, 1648.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
